page.description: Update a named ranges contents using a raw JSON Array or arrays (at optional range / default to A1 if unspecified)
page.prototype: UpdateNamedRangeRaw as L(namedrange as C,values as C)
page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.UpdateNamedRangeRaw("HISCORE","[[350]]")
